method.name: POST
method.doc:
To upload an update package with the web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the available updates URI.
Use the Discover local available updates API after uploading the update package for the appliance to list the package as an available update.
Use the Discover local available updates API after uploading the update package for the appliance to list the package as an available update.

response.doc:
If the update package was uploaded successfully and validated, the following is returned:
<textarea>{"status": 201}</textarea>
If the update package could not be validated, the following response is returned:
<textarea>{"status":422,"msg":"The system failed to install the requested update."}</textarea>
This web service will always return a 200 and a HTML body on success. The HTML body contains JSON which can be parsed to determine the result.
An update package was not found in the request. Review the example above and ensure that that the request contains multipart form data and that the package form field is named "uploadedfile".
